config.maidbeacon.server.beacon_cost: Max Cost To Use In Specific Beacon Level.
config.maidbeacon.server.itemstack: Material Required To Upgrade Beacon Level.
config.maidbeacon.server.effect_check_in: Beacon Effect Application Interval. (Note: This value only impacts performance and how quickly effects respond when entities enter/exit the range. It will not cause effects to expire prematurely or fail to reapply.)
config.maidbeacon.server.whitelist: Affected Entity Types. (Supports register names. Also, tags with a "#" prefix is also supported. (e.g., "#minecraft:animals" to target all animals).)
config.maidbeacon.client.beacon_renderin: Beacon Rendering Y Offset While Maid In Sitting Pose.
